sent.orig: As solution items, which appear in the Solution Items folder of Solution Explorer.
sent.trans: 作为解决方案项出现在解决方案资源管理器的“解决方案项”文件夹中。

sent.orig: Solution Items are always available from Solution Explorer when you open the solution.
sent.trans: 打开解决方案后，始终可从解决方案资源管理器使用“解决方案项”。

sent.orig: All solution items that you add to the solution are placed in the Solution Items folder.
sent.trans: 添加到解决方案中的所有解决方案项都被置于“解决方案项”文件夹中。

sent.orig: When solving different ordinary differential equations, we may take the analytical solution or numerical solution.
sent.trans: 不同类型的常微方程可以采用解析解法或者数值解法。

sent.orig: Equilibrium sorption capacity increases with increasing initial lead concentration, solution temperature, solution pH and sorbent dose.
sent.trans: 而在铅离子初浓度愈高、吸附剂剂量愈大、温度愈高、pH值愈高时，其平衡吸附量愈大。
